name: Whisker Squadron: Survivor
description:
The galaxy has become overrun with robotic bugs known as The Swarm. They multiply, divide, and conquer, leaving endless carnage in their wake. It is up to you and your crew of feline pilots to exterminate this threat for the good of all animalkind.



From the creators of RACE THE SUN comes Whisker Squadron: Survivor! Blast off on a perilous space epic in your customizable ship to defeat The Swarm once and for all. Continuously fight off waves of enemies in close quarters, upgrade your ship after each attempt, and most importantly, survive.

Features

  • Embark on an ever-changing adventure across neon-laced roguelike levels featuring on-rails shooter runs that change with every 20-30 minute playthrough
  • Design a fighter ship using randomized upgrades that can be built using scraps dropped throughout each level and Victory Points earned through play
  • Change the way your runs play out by unlocking mods as you earn achievements
  • Discover portals that will send you on a new and challenging secret path that will change the way you approach your run

Whisker Squadron: Survivor is only the beginning. Wishlist the next game in the series ahead of its early 2024 launch!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303400
